s2.message: Having problems with Adblock Plus? Let us know about them so that we can improve your experience. Download Adblock Plus for Chrome and other platforms here.

s4.message: Having problems with Adblock Plus? Let us know about them so that we can improve your experience. Download Adblock Plus for Chrome and other platforms here.

s5.message: Please consider the following points before filing your bug report.

s6.message: Some issues aren't Adblock Plus bugs

s7.message: An advertisement isn't blocked: this is a filters issue, please report it by other means.

s8.message: A website doesn't work correctly and temporarily disabling Adblock Plus on this site fixes the issue: this is a filters issue, please report it by other means.

s9.message:
An issue happens before Adblock Plus is installed or persists if it is uninstalled:
    you have to look elsewhere for an explanation.

s10.message: In particular, if Adblock Plus fails to install and you are using a supported browser then you are facing a browser issue and the

s15.message: Please have a look at the known issues (

s17.message: ) before reporting. You can also look through existing bug reports.

s19.message: Adblock Plus bugs can be reported in the forum.

s20.message:
Registration is optional but recommended if you want to
  get notified about answers.

s21.message: Please create a new topic, only add to an existing topic if you are absolutely sure that you are facing the same issue.

s22.message: Your bug report should contain all necessary information to reproduce it:

s23.message:
Adblock Plus version, which browser you are using (with version number) and which
    operating system is used

s24.message:
Any configuration details that might be relevant (filter lists used, own filters if any,
    unusual browser configuration, other extensions)

s25.message: Exact description of the steps that need to be followed to see the bug

s26.message: Exact description of what happens and what you think is wrong

s27.message: My bug report is no longer there, what happened?

s28.message: You came back and your bug report is no longer there?

s29.message:
Maybe the moderators
  changed the title to make it more meaningful, look around.

s30.message: Or it wasn't a valid bug report and has been moved to the general discussion forum (Firefox or Chrome).
